RoR_Engineer:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
RoR_Engineer:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

RoR_Engineer:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
RoR_Engineer:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
RoR_Engineer:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

RoR_Engineer:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
RoR_Engineer:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

RoR_Engineer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
RoR_Engineer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !RoR_Engineer:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

RoR_Engineer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
RoR_Engineer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !RoR_Engineer:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

RoR_Engineer:OrbSkill.NAME: Construct Auto Turret
RoR_Engineer:OrbSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Auto Turret. NL Increase base damage by 1.

RoR_Engineer:GrenadeLauncher.NAME: Grenade Launcher
RoR_Engineer:GrenadeLauncher.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times.
